motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • September 6, 2022, City Council meeting minutes • Resolution appointing a member of the Citizen Advisory Capital Improvements Committee • Resolution of approval of EPD Recycling, Waste Reduction, and Diversion Grant Application

motions.title: Resolution Establishing a Six-Month Moratorium on Cannabis Retail Stores
motions.description: Resolution establishing a 180-day moratorium on any permits or licenses for medical cannabis businesses pending final legal review.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for the purpose of personnel and litigation discussion.

discussionItems.title: Resolution to Declare Obsolete Equipment in the IT Department as Surplus
discussionItems.description: Resolution to declare obsolete phone equipment in the I.T. Department as surplus for donation to the City of Doraville for the sum of $1.00.

discussionItems.title: MARTA Parking Deck Mural Project
discussionItems.description: MARTA parking deck mural project with city paying one-third of cost ($50,000), PCID one-third, and MARTA one-third. Council requested rail bridge and 'Dunwoody' be incorporated if possible.

discussionItems.title: Mission and Vision Statements
discussionItems.description: Council Member Lautenbacher read the proposed mission and vision statements into the record.
